about_the_game:
TSW Compatible content released for a previous Train Sim World® - features may remain unchanged from the original release and may not make use of all newer core features.

Ready your hard hat and get to work in the yards of Hagen and Wuppertal with TSG’s DB G6 Diesel Shunter for Train Sim World®!

First produced in 2008, the G6 is a diesel-hydraulic shunter that is diminutive in size, making it suitable for smaller freight yards with unforgiving turning radiuses, while still being capable of outputting 900 horsepower and achieving up to 80 km/h. The loco can be fitted with multiple engine types, including the Cummins QSK23-L. In practice, the G6 is a rather unique locomotive to control; master the unconventional dynamic braking, set-up the cruise control and shunt with the locos in multiple.

Around 130 of the locomotives were built. They are largely owned by private companies and used on a leasing basis, sent to operators when they are in need of some additional motive power. In Train Sim World®, TSG’s G6 Shunter is used as a DB locomotive rented directly from the manufacturer, performing complex shunting duties on the busy Rhein-Ruhr Osten route.

Please note: Train Sim World® Rhein-Ruhr Osten: Wuppertal - Hagen Route Add-On is required, as a separate purchase, in order to utilise the content featured in this add-on.

Key Features


  • DB G6 Diesel Shunter in Green & Grey livery
  • Highly detailed, feature-rich, driving cabs with accurate true-to-life performance and handling
  • Unique features such as dynamic braking, dual-mode cruise control and 2 gears for different speed limits
  • Authentic and detailed sound recordings, recorded from the real locomotive
  • Additional Journey Mode chapter for Rhein-Ruhr Osten
  • Accessible Training Module and 5 detailed and engaging scenarios for Rhein-Ruhr Osten
  • Operable in and adds additional timetabled services to Rhein-Rhur Osten
  • Livery Designer and Scenario Planner compatible
  • Powered by Dovetail Games’ proprietary SimuGraph® vehicle dynamics engine and Unreal Engine 4® technology
  • Download size: 170.7 MB
